alert.note: Alert for Buffalo (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 21 at 10:42PM CDT until September 22 at 4:45AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... South Central Buffalo County in south central Nebraska... * Until 445 AM CDT Friday. * At 1042 PM CDT, emergency management reported thunderstorms producing heavy rain in Kearney. Between 1 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Emergency management reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Kearney. Numerous vehicles are caught in flooded streets. Highway 30 is also being affected as of 1040 PM CDT. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
